Articles.Content:
Hey guys, I'm stuck between a bit of a rock and a hard place and was wondering if I could find some pointers here.

I have a YouTube channel with 60 videos and only 4k views in total, are there certain tags I should use for a KSP video for example? My channel is all about gaming, what should I do to increase my channel traffic?

Any tips are greatly appreciated!

Thanks 7499275
I dunno about tags. All I know is create good vids and views will come.

All the KSP tags I added were Kerbin, Kerbal, Kerbal Space Program, Jebidiah.

That's it, but I haven't made a video in awhile. I could've used more. And tags don't help video traffic unless you add spam in there for popular channels, like PewDiePie or Machinima.

Alright, the way I've been seeing it my series can't be too bad I have on average a 5 to 1 like/dislike ratio so it can't be too God awful. Anyway thanks guys! If anyone has anymore suggestions please run them by!
